awscc_notifications_event_rule (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::Notifications::EventRule

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • arn (String)
  • creation_time (String)
  • event_pattern (String)
  • event_type (String)
  • managed_rules (List of String)
  • notification_configuration_arn (String)
  • regions (List of String)
  • source (String)
  • status_summary_by_region (Attributes Map) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for status_summary_by_region

Read-Only:

  • reason (String)
  • status (String)
